dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1973
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on art and Dostoevsky's phrase "Beauty will save the world." Laments the encroachment of the "totalitarian State," notes the spread of tax resistance, and inveighs against the Vietnam War. Admires the war resistance work of folk singer Joan Baez.
